lines.content: > "I understand that, without my agreement, Alpine F1 have put out a press release late this afternoon that I am driving for them next year. This is wrong and I have not signed a contract with Alpine for 2023. I will not be driving for Alpine next year." - Oscar Piastri ([source](https://twitter.com/OscarPiastri/status/1554527452231262210))
